product.descripcion:
Tenis de plataforma, calzado urbano y casual.
Características: Suela gruesa, cierre con cordones, material principal sintético (comúnmente).

results_by_angle.angle_name: Altura que estiliza sin tacón (plataforma discreta)
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Mujer 18-34 urbana que busca verse más alta y estilizada sin usar tacones

ad_copy.title: Estilo y altura sin esfuerzo
ad_copy.primary_text: Sube tu estilo con los Tenis Barbara. Ofrecen una sutil plataforma que alarga tu figura sin perder la comodidad. Perfectos para tu día a día sin preocuparte por lucir exagerada.
ad_copy.description: Alarga tu figura con los Tenis Barbara: comodidad y estilo sin tacones.

single_image_prompt.task: Create a visually appealing and modern image focused on style and subtle height elevation for Tenis Barbara.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: Ensure the Tenis Barbara is the central focus, with visible branding or distinct features highlighted.

single_image_prompt.prompt: A fashionable urban setting during golden hour, showcasing a young woman confidently walking down a stylish street wearing the Tenis Barbara. The focus is on the sneakers with their platform subtly highlighted by the angle and lighting. The background includes soft, blurred city elements, with warm sunlight creating a trendy and elevated look for the entire scene.

composition_rules.focus: The primary focus is on the sneakers, with the top third of the image containing the model's torso, while the bottom two-thirds feature the sneakers prominently.
composition_rules.hierarchy: Sneakers are the main focus, followed by the model's posture suggesting confidence, and finally the street styling that suggests urban living.
composition_rules.text_safe_zone: Ensure text overlays are in the top and bottom areas, avoiding the center where the sneakers are displayed.
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Text should never cover the sneakers or the model's lower body.

single_image_prompt.negative_prompt: Avoid cluttered backgrounds and overly complex cityscapes that distract from the product.

hooks_used: Piernas más largas en segundos. Plataforma discreta, efecto WOW.
Sube tu confianza, no los centímetros del tacón.
compliance_notes: Avoid direct medical claims about posture or orthopedic benefits.
Ensure no over-exaggeration of shoe dimensions beyond their true size.

results_by_angle.angle_name: Comodidad todo el día (plantilla memory foam + suela gruesa)
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Estudiante/office casual que camina mucho y prioriza confort sin perder estilo

ad_copy.title: Comodidad que dura todo el día
ad_copy.primary_text: Olvídate de pies cansados. Con los Tenis Barbara, la plantilla memory foam y suela gruesa aseguran suavidad en cada paso, desde el aula hasta la oficina. Ideal para quienes buscan estilo sin sacrificar confort.
ad_copy.description: Descubre la fusión perfecta entre moda y comodidad con los Tenis Barbara.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: Fixed angle, showing full shoe from side, close-up of texture.

single_image_prompt.prompt: A pair of stylish platform sneakers, prominently displayed in an urban setting. The sneakers, vibrant white with clean lines, rest on a smooth sidewalk with a softly blurred cityscape background. A subtle shadow casts from the shoes, emphasizing the memory foam and chunky sole design. Sunlight reflects gently on the surface, highlighting the synthetic material. The scene conveys a feeling of modern comfort and youthful energy.

composition_rules.focus: Center on the sneaker showing side profile with emphasis on sole and foam texture.
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Never cover the shoe's sole and memory foam texture.

single_image_prompt.negative_prompt: Avoid cluttered backgrounds and low-light settings.

hooks_used: Plantilla memory foam: pisa suave todo el día.
Más amortiguación, menos cansancio. Así de simple.
Suela chunky estable: comodidad real, no solo moda.
compliance_notes: Ensure that all claims regarding comfort are based on product features and user testimonials without using medical language.
The image must focus on lifestyle appeal without implying specific health outcomes.

results_by_angle.angle_name: Versatilidad de outfit (blanco que combina con todo)
results_by_angle.buyer_persona: Mujer que busca un par “comodín” para universidad, oficina casual y salidas

ad_copy.title: ¡Combina Con Todo!
ad_copy.primary_text: Descubre la versatilidad de los Tenis Barbara. Perfectos para cualquier ocasión: universidad, oficina casual o salidas entre amigas. Elegancia sin esfuerzo y estilo ilimitado con un solo par.
ad_copy.description: De jeans a vestido, siempre lista con los Tenis Barbara.

single_image_prompt.task: Create an eye-catching and stylish image showcasing the Barbara sneakers.

input_assets.product_lock_rule: Product must be clearly visible and central in the composition.

single_image_prompt.prompt: A stylish woman in an urban setting, effortlessly transitioning from day to night outfits with Barbara sneakers. She stands confidently on a street, surrounded by a blurred, bustling cityscape that suggests versatility and motion. The high contrast lighting highlights the pristine white sneakers she's wearing, making them the focal point. The composition is balanced, with her outfit seamlessly transitioning from casual jeans and a t-shirt to a smart-casual dress with a jacket, suggesting adaptability and elegance. Sunlight streams through tall buildings casting soft shadows, enhancing the urban chic vibe.

composition_rules.focus: The sneakers should be the clear focal point, with the model's outfit suggesting versatility.
composition_rules.text_safe_zone: Ensure text overlays stay within top 15% and bottom 15% of the image to avoid clutter and maintain visual harmony.
composition_rules.text_never_cover_rule: Do not cover the sneakers or main outfit elements in the center of the image.

single_image_prompt.negative_prompt: Blurred sneakers, dark or dingy settings, cluttered backgrounds, overly dramatic shadows.

hooks_used: De la U a la oficina casual sin cambiarte los tenis.
Limpios = elegantes. Súmale una chaqueta y listo.
compliance_notes: Ensure text overlays do not obscure the product.
